attributes.action: Negotiate continued passporting rights as part of an EU/UK deal.
attributes.additional_details: Without passporting rights UK citizens resident in the EU will risk severe difficulties if, as is possible, their UK bank accounts are closed.
attributes.background: Passporting rights allow providers of financial services, for example, banks, to provide those services throughout the EU. The government should secure these rights to allow seamless money transactions throughout Europe to continue.
